name: British Butterfly Cakes
author: Matty
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease or line 20 muffin cups with paper liners
Beat white sugar and 7 tablespoons butter together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; add eggs, vanilla extract, and baking powder and beat until smooth
Sift flour into creamed butter mixture until batter is smooth
Spoon 2 tablespoons batter into each muffin cup
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 15 minutes
Cool cupcakes in the tin for 3 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
Mix confectioners' sugar and 1/2 cup butter together in a bowl until frosting is smooth; spread onto cooled cupcakes
